item.title: Guinea-Bissau president flees to Senegal after coup
item.description: Umaro Sissoco Embal√≥ has arrived in Senegal "safe and sound" on a chartered military plane, authorities say.

item.title: What we know about shooting of National Guard in Washington DC
item.description: Sarah Beckstrom, 20, has died, while Andrew Wolfe, 24, remains in a critical condition.

item.title: Watch: Pope struggles to remove cloth covering plaque
item.description: It took several attemps for Pope Leo and church clergy to unveil a plaque covered by a white sheet at an Istanbul cathedral.

item.title: Ten killed in deadliest Israeli raid for months in southern Syria
item.description: The village of Beit Jinn came under attack in what Israel said was an operation against a militant group.

item.title: Trump says US will pause migration from 'third-world countries'
item.description: The president did not name which countries would be affected, but vowed to remove anyone "not a net asset" to the US.
